C00.title: StudentenStadt - rotes Haus bistro
C00.challenge: There is a bell, hanging somewhere in the Bistro. You need to find out what happens, if you ring it, but be careful! If you do it yourself, you have to deal with the consequences on your own...
options: you have to ex a beer
You have to buy everyone a shot
you have to buy everyone a beer
C00.right_answer: You have to buy everyone a shot

C01.title: Neuraum club
C01.challenge: It's one of the more popular clubs in Munich - remember it, they often have free entrance for students! But there is also other imporant place nearby, a bus station. You will probably use it if you want (which you should) travel somewhere while you in Munich. Can you find it?

C02.title: Bierstube
C02.challenge: Challenge any person in the bar to play table football with you. Can you win against them?

C03.title: Bierstube
C03.challenge: Challenge any person in the bar to play table football with you. Can you win against them?

C04.title: HANS IM GLÜCK
C04.challenge: Hans is a very old, common German name. Can you name the most common German surname?

C05.title: StudentenStadt - Manhattan
C05.challenge: Have you managed it all the way to the top? This is the highest place of such kind in Munich! People from Bayern have a special name for bars where you can drink beer outside. Do you know it?

C06.title: TU Film
C06.challenge: Each Christmas, there is a tradition of showing a certain old movie three times here. Find out which movie it is!

C07.title: TU Film
C07.challenge: Each Christmas, there is a tradition of showing a certain old movie three times here. Find out which movie it is!

C08.title: Schelling-salon
C08.challenge: Which known German historical figure was banned from visiting this establishment for not paying their bills?

C09.title: Hofbräuhaus am Platzl
C09.challenge: This was the last building rebuilt after the second world war. Only one room survived the conflict. Go in, ask around, and find out which!
